snippet: TISHMAN--John. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of John Tishman, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to John's daughter, Katherine Blacklock; his son, Daniel R. Tishman; his daughter-in-law, Sheryl Crockett Tishman; his grandchildren, Joshua, Gabriel, and Kyle; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: TISHMAN--John. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of John Tishman, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to John's daughter, Katherine Blacklock; his son, Daniel R. Tishman; his daughter-in-law, Sheryl Crockett Tishman; his grandchildren, Joshua, Gabriel, and Kyle; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
